source.d2283b01:
items = df[['Education', 'MntWines','MntFruits', 'MntMeatProducts', 'MntFishProducts', 'MntSweetProducts', 'MntGoldProds']]
edu = items[df['Education'].isin(['Graduation', 'PhD', 'Master', '2n Cycle', 'Basic'])].groupby(by='Education').sum()
edu.plot(kind='bar', figsize=(30, 15))

items = df[['Kidhome', 'MntWines','MntFruits', 'MntMeatProducts', 'MntFishProducts', 'MntSweetProducts', 'MntGoldProds']]
edu = items[df['Kidhome'].isin([0, 1, 2])].groupby(by='Kidhome').sum()
edu.plot(kind='bar', figsize=(30, 15))
